net.sf.JRecord.External

Class ExternalRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.External.Def.AbstractUpdatableRecord
      • net.sf.JRecord.External.base.BaseExternalRecord<ExternalRecord>
        • net.sf.JRecord.External.ExternalRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sf.JRecord.External.base.IAddDependingOn, net.sf.JRecord.External.Def.IFieldUpdatedListner, IBasicSchemaBuilder, ICsvSchemaBuilder, IFixedWidthSchemaBuilder

    public class ExternalRecord
extends net.sf.JRecord.External.base.BaseExternalRecord<ExternalRecord>
implements ICsvSchemaBuilder, IFixedWidthSchemaBuilder
    This class holds the interchange format of of a RecordLayout. It can be
    • Read from a file (See CopybookLoaderFactory).
    • Written to an external file (See CopybookWriterManager).
    • Converted to the internal format (LayoutDetail). See the method asLayoutDetail.
    • Read from RecordEditor's DB's with SQL like: 
             Select
              RecordId,
              RecordName,
              Description,
              RecordType,
              System,
              ListChar,
              CopyBook,
              Delimiter,
              Quote,
              PosRecInd,
              RecSepList,
              RecordSep,
              Canonical_Name,
              Record_Style recordStyle,
              File_Structure fileStructure
       From Tbl_R_Records
    This class also provides both specific field access methods and Generic (based on Field number) access 
     Example:
       CopybookLoader loader = CopybookLoaderFactory.getInstance()
                                    .getLoader(CopybookLoaderFactory.RECORD_EDITOR_XML_LOADER);
       ExternalRecord externalLayout = loader.loadCopyBook(copybookName, 0, 0, "", 0, 0, null);
       LayoutDetail layout = externalLayout.asLayoutDetail();
